tool_description: Search through a database of over 500 exercises in mulitple search fromats. Search by name, primary muscle, secondary muscle, etc. Get exercise name, force type, primary muscles, secondary muscles, experience level, exercise type, equipment, etc!
name: ExerciseAPI
title: ExerciseAPI

api_list.name: GetExperiences
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exerciseapi3.p.rapidapi.com/experiences"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exerciseapi3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
